mapper.select: select a.id, a.section, a.book, a.volume, a."group", a.article, a.type, a.image, b.short_title from internal_exams_listening a join practices_practiceproblem b on a.section = b.section and a.book = b.book and a.volume = b.volume and a.group = b.group and a.article = b.article where a.id = #{id}

select id, section, book, volume, "group", article, type, image from internal_exams_listening where section = #{section} and book = #{book} and volume = #{volume} and "group" = #{group} and article = #{article}
mapper.insert: insert into internal_exams_listening ( created, modified, section, book, volume, "group", article, type, image ) values ( now(), now(), #{section}, #{book}, #{volume}, #{group}, #{article}, #{type}, #{image} )
